Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory179.png'}
{3: "You're strolling through a bustling Kowloong-inspired district, thinking you'll pick up a few mementos to bring home..."}
{3: 'But most of the specialty items and souvenirs are so pricey that you hesitate at every stand.'}
{3: "What you'd find all over Kowloong's streets is treated like high-end merchandise here."}
{1: '1', 3: "Right when you're feeling stuck, you notice a familiar silhouette on the other side of the road."}
{2: 'Qu.', 3: '9', 4: "It's a rare sight to see someone so busy taking a moment to wander around town.", 5: '9'}
{3: 'Qu nods slightly in acknowledgment.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The same to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Why are you standing outside the souvenir shop looking so worried?', 4: '1'}
{2: "They're way too expensive...", 3: '13', 4: "I'm just strapped for... cash, you know.", 5: '13'}
{3: 'When Qu hears this, she frowns and quickly steps into the store.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "Oh my! If it isn't Lady Qu herself! What a rare honor!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Wearing an overly eager smile, the shop owner steps forward, but Qu's gaze slides right past him and fixes on the shockingly high price tags next to the goods."}
{3: 'Afterward, Qu turns her attention back to the shop owner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "W-well, the prices here are higher than in Kowloong, but shipping from Kowloong isn't cheap, you know... Once you factor that in...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu shows no emotion.'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "Then... it's just...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The shop owner stutters, his voice growing quieter while sweat beads on his forehead.'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "...I'll revert the price to normal right now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Don't let this happen again.", 4: '1'}
{3: "From start to finish, Qu hardly says a thing. She only speaks up at the very end, and it's just a brief line."}
{3: 'Once the shop owner adjusts the prices, Qu meets your gaze, silently telling you to follow her out.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{3: 'You walk alongside Qu for a bit before you head into a clothing store with a Kowloong vibe.'}
{3: 'Qu goes straight for a rack in the back and picks out a silk jacket.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: '【kuroname】, I think this outfit will look perfect on you. Why not try it on?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure.', 3: '37', 4: 'No need. I trust your taste.', 5: '38'}
{3: 'Qu drapes the coat over your shoulders.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I want to see you wearing it.', 4: '1'}
{3: "As Qu speaks, she's already slipping the coat over your shoulders."}
{3: 'Then she presses all ten fingers against your arm, slowly measuring downward...'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "The shoulders look fine—now... let's see the waist.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bit by bit, Qu's fingertips slide along the garment and settle at your waist."}
{2: 'Haha, Qu, easy...', 3: '44', 4: "Good thing I'm not ticklish.", 5: '44'}
{3: 'After you put on the coat, Qu steps back two paces, carefully checks it over, then nods in approval.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Looks great. It's exactly how I like it—though I wonder if you like it, too?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I do.', 3: '48', 4: "If you think it's fine, then there's no problem...", 5: '48'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Now that the coat is all set, it's time to find some matching pants.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll leave it to you.", 3: '50', 4: 'I... will take care of this myself.', 5: '50'}
{3: 'Qu browses through the different pants hanging on the rack.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Since you rarely come here, I won't let you leave until we find the perfect match.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "By the way, I hear there's a special performance here tonight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Coincidentally, I just bought a skirt in the same color scheme a few days ago.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It's Double Seventh Festival, and I'm sure you haven't forgotten you're my partner.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Obviously.', 3: '59', 4: 'How could I forget?', 5: '59'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Alright, I'll go back and change in a little while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'See you tonight.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Get yourself ready too, and don't let me down.", 4: '1'}
